label: uncl3299
comment: Code specifying the purpose of an address.

values.label: At home
values.comment: The address is the home address.

values.label: Contact address
values.comment: Address where contact may be made.

values.label: Medical care address
values.comment: Address where medical care is provided.

values.label: Patient admitted from
values.comment: Address from where a patient is admitted.

values.label: Visit address
values.comment: The address where a visit takes place.

values.label: Patient discharged to
values.comment: Address to where a patient is discharged.
